synopsis.text: Love and romance face a dire threat from the wicked Lady Raindevila, who seeks to eliminate them from the world. However, hope springs from an unlikely source - Momoko, a cheerful schoolgirl who receives a mysterious ruby ring from her mother. Little does she know, this ring grants her the power to transform into a magical warrior of love. Joined by her two best friends, Momoko leads a double life battling Raindevila's devilish minions. During the day, she navigates crushes and school drama like any other teenager. At night, she taps into angelic strength to counter the forces of evil. With the fate of love itself hanging in the balance, Momoko embraces her destiny to save relationships and spread romance throughout the land. Though the odds seem stacked against them, the power of love burns brightly in Momoko and her friends' hearts, lighting their way.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
